reviewText:
Old movies give a more wholesome and innocent look on life, even though this involves a robbery.  Enjoyable, and contains a moral to the story as well.

Love seeing the fashions, cars, phones, etc
We have not received it yet as of 22/08/2011. But my wife is looking foward to seeing again after so many years. my wife  enjoyed it so much that is why I am buying it for her.
